column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf//// I definitely won't be in a Hurry to go back for dinner
column2: but will definitely go back for cocktails
column3: because you can bring your own btl of wine or bubbly
column5: they just ask that you share a taste w/1 other guest in the restaurant. And the appetizers were quite good. Again
column6: the ambiance I really loved & such an intimate setting.
